alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 6:44PM AKDT until March 19 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Kodiak Island. * WHEN...Until 1 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Observations and webcams have been showing one half mile visibility as moderate to heavy snow bands move westward from the Gulf of Alaska. These bands will continue to affect the area through 1 AM Saturday with gradually improving conditions thereafter. Even after the snow tapers off, winds are expected to remain gusty out of the northwest through the day Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
